verbs.description: Three Korean - Americans [V: were] greeted by President Donald Trump beneath a giant American flag after they returned to the mainland U.S. early Thursday .
[ARG1: Three Korean - Americans] were [V: greeted] [ARG0: by President Donald Trump] [ARGM-LOC: beneath a giant American flag] [ARGM-TMP: after they returned to the mainland U.S. early Thursday] .
